attachments.displayName:
SOIRÉE DE LUXE LOVES INBAL DROR

Hello everyone, we hope you’ve all enjoyed and have now fully recovered from the fun, frolics and fireworks of bonfire night! Speaking of sparklers, we wanted to share with you our love/admiration/obsession for the stunning bridal gowns by Inbal Dror. We have been such HUGE fans of Israeli designer Inbal Dror for some time now and figured it would be cruel to keep these from you for any longer…

Continue reading... http://www.soireedeluxe.co.uk/blog/soiree-de-luxe-loves-inbal-dror/
